name: Driftshell
description:
This is a very early PVP net-code demo for High-Speed Mech Combat Game, Driftshell.

I will be working on updates to improve on this game.

Features:

Online PVP!!!!

Notes about the early Netcode: 

  • The PVP mode was made with 1 v 1 duels in mind
  • If one player leaves the game in the middle of the match both players must restart the game and create a new lobby room
  • when one player is defeated both players will be booted back to the lobby menu to make another PVP Room

Gamepad support only. No keyboard

Gamepad Controls:

  • Left - Sitck to move
  • Right - Stick to aim camera
  • R1 - Dash
  • R2 - Fire Right weapon
  • L1 - Boost / Fly
  • L2 - Fire Left Weapon
